using Turing
    include("utils.jl")

    @model function bag_of_marbles(start::Array{Int}=[4,8,6],first::Int=1)

        red   = 3
        colors = [white,blue,red]

        draw0 ~ Categorical(simplex([start[white],start[blue],start[red]]))
        if draw0 == first
            draw1 ~ Categorical(simplex([start[white]-1,start[blue],start[red]]))
        elseif draw0==first

        else
            # red

        end

\[p(woman)=1-p(man)=1-0.62=0.38\]
\[p(not again|woman)=0.48\]
\[p(not again, woman)=p(not again|woman)*p(woman)\approx 0.18\]

这就是(b) 的答案:0.41,假设参加戒烟训练班的有 100人, 41 人没有再碰过烟

的答案:

\[p(woman|not again)=\frac{p(not again, woman)}{p(not again)}=\frac{0.18}{0.41}\approx 0.439\]

struct Bag

"定义袋子类型2,需要传入关键字"
Base.@kwdef struct Bag2

"""
枚举限定球种类
@ref:snippetslab://snippet/6016DF64-9B90-420E-83F7-7C6FF7D4A139
"""
@enum Ball red = 1 blue = 2 green = 3

function new_bag_space_prob(bag::Union{Bag,Bag2}, pick::Ball=red)::Tuple{Bag,Real}
    (; red, blue, green) = bag # struct 解构
    ball = Int(pick) # @enum 类型需要转换为整型
    prob_size = +(red, blue, green)  # 合计球总数
    res::Tuple{Bag,Real} = if ball == 1
        (Bag([red - 1, blue, green]...), red // prob_size)
    elseif ball == 2
        (Bag([red, blue - 1, green]...), blue // prob_size)
    else
        (Bag([red, blue, green - 1]...), green // prob_size)
    end
    return res
end

2. 计算获得观测值的概率
从 Figure 1 可以看到能观测到 2点的值, 每个骰子都有机会
4 面的骰子获得2️⃣ 的概率为: \[d4*d42=\frac{1}{3}*\frac{1}{4} \tag{1.1}\]
6面的骰子获得2️⃣ 的概率为: \[d6*d62=\frac{1}{3}*\frac{1}{6} \tag{1.2}\]
8面的骰子获得2️⃣ 的概率为: \[d8*d82=\frac{1}{3}*\frac{1}{8} \tag{1.3}\]
全概率为以上三个概率的和 \[total=d4*d42+d6*d62+d8*d82\]

function  dp_arr(num::Int)
  arr=Rational[]

  end 
  total=sum(arr)

通过三次考试,获得精算师证书的概率
在 Figure 1 中,沿着绿色的路径就是三次考试成功的路径, 成功获得证书就是三次成功概率的乘积 \[p_{succsss}=s1*s2*s3  \tag{1.1}\]

   s1=0.9;s2=0.8;s3=0.7
   "p_success"=>s1*s2*s3

"p_success" => 0.504




在第二次考试中失败的概率
如果没有通过考试, 那么在三次开始中都有可能失败,所以失败的条件下,需要重新计算总概率空间
失败的全概率为: \[total=(f1+s1*f2+s1*s2*f3) \tag{1.2}\]
\(f1\) 可以写为: \[f1=1-s1 \tag{1.3}\] 其他项以此类推,失败全概率为:

total=(1-s1)+(s1*(1-s2))+(s1*s2*(1-s3))

"total_failure"=>total

"total_failure" => 0.496


所以在第二次考试中失败的概率为:
\[\frac{(s1*f2)}{total} \tag{1.4}\]

"failure_at_second"=>(s1*(1-s2))/total

"failure_at_second" => 0.36290322580645157

include("utils.jl")

@model function book_bags(num_blue_chips=2)
    bag1 = 1 # 3 blue 7 red
    bag2 = 2 #  7 blue 3 red

    bag ~ Categorical([0.5,0.5])
    
    blue = 1
    red = 2

    n = 5
    draw = tzeros(num_blue_chips)
    for d in 1:num_blue_chips
        if bag == bag1
            draw[d] ~ Categorical([0.3,0.7])
        else
            draw[d] ~ Categorical([0.7,0.3])
        end
    end

    # We've seen $test number of blue chips
    for d in 1:num_blue_chips
        true ~ Dirac(draw[d] == blue)
    end

end
